hints.content:
$\purple{80}$ flowers is the same as $\purple{8\text{ groups of ten}}$ flowers.

There are $\blue5$ garden beds.

Total number of flowers:  
$\begin{align}&\blue5\times\purple{8\text{ groups of ten}}\\
=&\red{40\text{ groups of ten}}\\
=&\red{400}\end{align}$

question.content:
A gardener is planting flowers. She plants $80$ flowers in each garden bed. She plants $5$ garden beds.  


**How many flowers does the gardener plant in all?**

[[â˜ƒ input-number 1]] flowers
